purpose: To develop an AI that can play the Chinese card game DouDizhu at a high skill level using self-play reinforcement learning techniques.
principle: Employs deep reinforcement learning with a focus on self-play to iteratively improve the AI's performance in the game of DouDizhu.
reusability: Can be used as a foundation for developing AI agents for other card games or similar turn-based strategy games. The codebase is modular, allowing for customization and adaptation.
limitations: Primarily focused on DouDizhu, may require significant adaptation for other games; computationally intensive training process.
name: DouZero
description: [ICML 2021] DouZero: Mastering DouDizhu with Self-Play Deep Reinforcement Learning | 斗地主AI
highlight: Mastering the Chinese card game DouDizhu using self-play deep reinforcement learning.
